title: Firefox
content:
Dear Sir/ Madam,

In the last month I was a victim of an a scam which accessed my PC. I had to get help from a IT consultant. Unfortunatly, he omitted to set to re-install bookmarks.

To progress further I need ave my account details which I have forgotten . Can you assist me please.

j A Murphy
creator: james.a.murphy

title: Firefox doesn't open links in external apps
content:
I am running Firefox 124.0.1 on Mac OS Sonoma 14.4.1.

I set Firefox as my default browser. However, when I have links that should redirect and open in an external application (Apple News, Facebook Messenger, etc.), Firefox does not redirect to these external applications. I have searched the FAQ and the internet but haven't seen an answer to this. As a result I have switched my default browser back to Edge, which functions as expected.
creator: dfontenot70518

title: firefox cant render some icons and uses hex values instead
content:
the Icons code on github in this file are not correct rendered in Firefox. If I use these icons in my terminal they will get rendered in the terminal.

  • fonts-font-awesome is installed
  • Allow pages to use their own fonts is enabled
  • all addons are disabled
  • security.sandbox.content.level 1
  • gfx.downloadable_fonts.enabled true
  • use hardware acceleration available enable/disable makes no difference
  • Ubuntu 23.10
  • 6.5.0-26-generic
  • Mozilla Firefox 124.0.1
creator: q4rockz1

title: cannot get browser to update
content: I cannot get firefox to update. It is set up for automatic updates but they don't happen. Even if I try manual installation of updates it says the update fails. I ran it in troubleshooting mode and the problem still exists. I restarted my computer and the problem still exists. I am using a mac running on Monterey. How can I get it to auto update again? (and even though it says failed to check for or install updates, it looks like I do have the latest version of firefox)
creator: pzioga

title: cannot get browser to update
content: I cannot get firefox to update. It is set up for automatic updates but they don't happen. Even if I try manual installation of updates. Nothing works. title: Firefox start after troubleshoot mode with annoying success page i can't change.
content:
Dear Community,

After I tried to fix a slow browser in troubleshoot mode and reseted firefox, I get each time i start Firefox a success page with the option of restoring tabs.

I don't want that, I want my own startpage when i start Firefox, but i tried to get rid of it whiteout success. I enclosed a screenshot of the page i see everytime now.

I hope there is a solution for it to get my startpage back.

Thank you in advance,

Robert

title: Account recovery key has not restored bookmarks and saved passwords
content: My old ssd suffered a fatal capacitor melt down. I have a new one and used my account recovery key when i installed Mozilla. However - NONE of my bookmarks or saved passwords have appeared!!! Previously running Windows 10, which is also running on new ssd. I'm not a fan of 11, resigned to install if it means I recover lost data! What did I do wrong? How can I recover them? Many, MANY thanks in advance!!! Hayley
creator: hayley.parks0

title: I can't log out from a site using an old version of firefox. Impossible to get locked out anymore which would be important though!
content: Hi I have been using firefox on linux for a while without updating it. We are artsellers and I used to be able to log in and out of an artplatform without any problems. It's now been a few weeks since logging out is not possible any more on this platform which means that I am constantly logged in which I really do not want. The menu does not work anymore on this side whereas it works with other browers. I already contacted the platform. They cannot do anything about it themselves and asked me to contact your team. Please help. Thank you Best regards from Germany C. Marsac
creator: asupta

title: How to change the number of tabs scrolling left-right with mouse wheel when number of opened tabs is more
content:
Hi,

There are almost 30+ opened tabs in my firefox at any given time. So I scroll over them using muse wheel. But for each notch of mouse wheel scroll, almost 6~7 tabs move left/right.

I would like change this number to 1 tab per notch of mouse wheel scroll.

Is this possible through editing any flags?

Thanks

title: How do I stop the Mozilla Updater Service, from being enabled again after I upgrade firefox
content: I disabled it for a reason. Because it slows down my computer and causes crashes.
creator: desbest

title: Pdf formátum megnyitása
content: A Firefox win 10 alatt fut és alapértelmezett programként van beállítva a PDF fájlokhoz. A fájlkezelőben ha rákkantintok egy Pdf kiterjesztésű fájlra, akkor feljön a Firefox, kapok egy üres ablakot és nem történik semmi. A Firefox Fájl/Fájl megnyitása paranccsal az újonnan indított Firefox simán megnyitja a dokumentumot. Ötletet kérnék, hogy ezt miképp lehetne orvosolni. A korábbi verzióval simán működött ez a szolgáltatás. Üdvözlettel Zebu
creator: zeb.gyu

title: I lost all my password after sync (I did forgot password)
content: Hi. I am a graphic designer and Web master. I use your browser since I think it's the best. I did a format of my pc and I forgot the password of my account. So I did forgot password. Thinking all my password would of sync and follow me. But it didn't. I had over 1000 password from site that I have recently work on and some still working on it. Which were most of them auto generate. Which I wouldn't have a clue of any of them. PLEASE Is there a way for me to regret my passwords? Only the password. Please thanks!

title: autoprint despite setting otherwise.
content:
Firefox autoprints Microsoft Word and Excel documents despite setting otherwise.

about:config print.always_print_silent is now set to false. (was somehow set to true). After I set to false and reboot, same behavior occurs. I verified that same behavior does not occur in other browser.
creator: danielh1
